manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Clearly HD mirror This portable HD makeup mirror is perfect for makeup, hair styling, travel and more daily use. This is a perfect gift for people who like makeup, love beauty, makeup gurus and more.

Precision sewing This portable mirror adopts precise stitching technology when stitching, so that the stitched cotton thread is smooth and regular, effectively preventing the leather from splitting. Dirt-resistant and practical The high-quality leather is fully wrapped to protect the glass from damage, making this travel mirror more durable. Black leather is not easy to get dirty, keep the mirror clean and beautiful. Prevent scratches The edge of this portable mirror adopts diamond cutting technology, which is beautiful and better to prevent glass scratches. Easy to carry This mirror has four different sizes, which is easy to carry, and it is very convenient to touch up makeup on the way to travel or work.

Multi-size The ultra-high-definition mirror shows you the most beautiful you! Foldable mirror to protect the mirror. Multi-size, with a vanity mirror on the table, a small portable mirror. 4.3×2.9 in 6.4×5.3 in 8.7×6.1 in 10×7.8 in

Multiple angle adjustment Easily adjust the angle of the mirror you want to 90, 120 or 145 degrees, which is very convenient. Adjustable stand Let you put down the mirror, adjust to the perfect angle, every detail takes care of a more perfect makeup, this is the perfect complement to the bathroom!
Folding Travel Mirror Travel Mirror with Light Travel makeup mirror Light ✓ ✓ Adjustable ✓ ✓ ✓ 360° rotate ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my needs
reviews.reviewText: EFAILY Folding Travel Mirror, PU Portable Adjustable Rectangular Ultrathin Mirror, for Travel, Camping,Home (4.3W×2.9L) ($5.99)I had a small mirror that I dropped and accidentally broke. I was looking for a replacement and came across this. It looks like a wallet when folded up and is similar in size. Looks nice and the mirror is clear. The mirror seems sturdy and thick, and the edges are beveled. The cover seems well padded and seems it would be good at protecting the mirror from shattering if it took a tumble. Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice travel mirror for the price
reviews.reviewText: Mirror has excellent clarity, is protected by a cover and is a good size for my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for traveling!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve owned this mirror for a while purchased here on Amazon. This Christmas, I purchased a few more and gave them out as gifts.I like to do my make up in front of a window in natural daylight, and this mirror is perfect for that.Great mirror, very packable, wonderful for traveling!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mirror's great, listing info lame
reviews.reviewText: - Made in China- Case is PU leather- Pretty sure it's glass tho the listing doesn't bother to say- There are no "adjustable brackets", at least not on the 4x3 size I got. It does, however, stay in just about any tilted position simply because the pleather is so thick and stiff- There is no "double layer edging", I think they might mean the beveled edge- There is no such thing as an "HD" mirror but the one I got is quite clear (see my pic)- The edges are decently smooth but the corners are still corners and poky- I have no idea what "uniform transition" and "no strokes" is supposed to meanJust another foreign AliBaba reseller that just slaps in a bunch of words they think are English.Having said all that, it's a very decent mirror. It's thick and sturdy (see my pic). The cover is also thick and sturdy and water won't ruin it. The large stitching, much moreso than the listing pix, is child-like but straight and decent enough.I assumed this was plastic. I was looking for an unbreakable camping mirror, but it's good enough I'll keep at my desk for unexpected zit checks.5 star mirror, 4 stars for the ridiculous overhype, missing and poor info. I'll update if anything pops up but my initial impression is quite good.Don't forget to use the Smile.Amazon.com address - It's an Amazon program where many everyday things you buy will generate a small donation from Amazon to the charity of your choice at no cost to you. Info here: https://smile.amazon.com/gp/chpf/about/ref=smi_se_rspo_laas_aas

reviews.reviewText: It's great having a extra mirror when traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great mirror, but….
reviews.reviewText: It came with a crack/chip in the corner.Since amazon doesn’t pick up for free anymore. It’s really not worth it for me to uber to the ups store or spend $8 to have ups come pick it up. Otherwise I would return it.This didn’t happen in delivery. The item has this great protective cover and if also came in a box and bubble wrapped packaging. The defect had to be there before delivery. If not for that. Its great. Its just sad that I have to see that blemish every time I use the mirror. Its a great size for my requirements.This case thing is pretty amazing the stitches are very tight. It’s definitely not cheap looking. The mirror itself has beveled edges. So its not a cheap looking mirror either. I would probably take a chance on buying another one if I were not needing it right now.
